title: SWB4Real.com Font
content:
Hi,

Can someone please help me to identify the block font used on [www.SWB4Real.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130625/http:/www.swb4real.com/ "www.SWB4Real.com")?

Here is an example:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130625im_/http:/typophile.com/files/title_results_4907.png)

Thank you in advance, Ian

Font: 

 Xerography 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130625/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [title\_results.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130625/http:/typophile.com/files/title_results.png) | 2.61 KB |
author: makzan

comments.content:
I expected to find this grungy typewriter in boxes at Dafont [http://www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=113&text=THISISSWBNEWS&fpp=100](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130625/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=113&text=THISISSWBNEWS&fpp=100 "http://www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=113&text=THISISSWBNEWS&fpp=100") but drew a blank. If someone does not spot a matching font you could pick one of these and do a slightly out of alignment series of box frames. BTW also did not spot it at Myfonts.  
Don

This is **[Xerography](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130625/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=Xerography%20-%20Regular&fid=a97cecfd8abe43cb58cd4e82fbb698f5&fsize=60&text=THIS%20IS%20SWB%20THE%20UNDERGROUND%20KING&wrap=2)** free font by Vic Fieger [2005, Dafont.com]  
You need to invert the colors to match your sample.

Thanks fvilanakis, that's the one!

donshottype, thanks for looking :)
